attributes.action: strike a commemorative medal for those who assisted with the recent floods emergencies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The armed forces, the emergency services, police, media and a host of volunteers in the entire flood affected areas of the UK in 2007 worked tirelessly in the face of unprecedented and overwhelming volumes of water. 

Cited as the greatest peacetime operation in recent times these people deserve to be recognised for their tireless endeavors and remarkable achievements.

This petition is to request that a commemorative medal be struck to mark the event and awarded to those, who in the face of uncertainty and danger, showed selflessness and heroism in adversity.
